GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: gets an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: gets an artile with a specific id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: gets an array of comment objects for a given article
